overall.description: Join a sequence of arrays along a new axis.

arrays.description: Each array must have the same shape.

axis.description: The axis in the result array along which the input arrays are stacked.

out.description: If provided, the destination to place the result. The shape must be correct, matching that of what stack would have returned if no out argument were specified.

stacked.description: The stacked array has one more dimension than the input arrays.
